咁仆街

我都係早排先知，而家覺得個世界好撚黑暗，啲人會夾埋一齊玩鳩你

我自問成世人都對人好好，點解人地要咁對翻我

take all the shits for granted,dont give a fk to real friends.those fking ppl just dont deserve a friend.they should all go fk themselves.Thats what i learned from ppl.

Best friend mean I pull the trigger,best friend mean you get what you deserve.Friends are overrated,are fking jokes,but these jokes ain't fun at all.I would rather buy a ponhub premium membership and just typing the word friends in the searching bar,that would tend to make it much more amusing tho.

ppl come into our life and just fking leave.Keep that in mind.You only live once,you gotta think of yourself,dont trying too hard for forcing yourself to be with some shitty dude.fking nigga.Unless you got to do wat u got to.I really dont understand why ppl seems satisified even though friends are overrated.

On top of that,you might note that actually I'm insinuating that I couldn't actually get laid.Yea,I fked up my life tho.But chicago nigga dont bring a gun in fight so thats fine.I think you will learn those shit eventually.

Btw,Claire "Lightning" Farron is hot,if you're gonna ask me how hot is lightning?I would say she is extremely hot,slizzling hot,actually 50000 degrees,5 times hotter than the surface of sun..can you imagine how attractive is she to male?On a scale of 1 to 10 i would give it like 100/10,bro.Even though ppl keep saying that she has no personality,she is a bitch.But I dont give a dam.Coz she not only has looks,she also has brain.

Lightning is best, Lightning is forever. Ever since I met Lightning I've been praying for absolution for ever thinking about anyone else. Sometimes I go to the church confessionals and tell the man please forgive me for father I have sinned against the greatness that is Lightning. Lightning is love, Lightning is life.
